Articles.Content:
Hello there,

do you know that, when you have an idea and the outcome just doesn't do, what its supposed to do? I will present you the SSTO XenOrb IV:

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/ScGzy)

Action Groups:

1: 8 ion engines

2: 2 jet engines

3: 2 jet engines

4: solar panels

0: 32 air intakes

22t cargo to Mun or Minmus orbit... if you have the patience.

~ 320 Parts

[http://www.filedropper.com/ssto-xenorbiv\_1](http://www.filedropper.com/ssto-xenorbiv_1)

It was supposed to go to laythe with little cargo, but it has not enough delta v, even without cargo and a few more xenon tanks doesn't change that. There is one major problem: a Jool burn is ever on the dark side of kerbin. I tried to use it as semi-transfer stage, but this takes ages. Landing on Minmus is not possible. It is pretty useless. however, it flys like a young god and in my opinion it looks great.

Some additional Heavy Metal

![EkBCb5F.png](http://i.imgur.com/EkBCb5F.png)This is a fully working crane, which is just as useless as the SSTO

Nooo... no no no... not ... *useless*... well, a little bit.. kinda... okay, yeah, sorta useless. But pretty! very pretty....

I better just shut up now...
